Classification on ionosphere for ionosphere_data with adaboost.

	- Database name : ionosphere
	- View name : ionosphere_data	 View shape : (351, 34)
	- Learning Rate : 0.7492877492877493
	- Labels used : bad, good
	- Number of cross validation folds : 7

Classifier configuration : 
	- Adaboost with n_estimators : 46, base_estimator : DecisionTreeClassifier
